typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pLote as string,
	pMesAnoRef as string
}
source(output(
		account_no as string,
		id_fatura as string,
		id_open_item as string,
		nota_fiscal as string,
		vlr_item as decimal(15,2),
		serie_nf as string,
		subserie_nf as string,
		conta_cobranca as string,
		vlr_total_atribuido as decimal(15,2),
		vlr_atribuido as decimal(15,2),
		dt_ajuste as timestamp,
		hr_ajuste as string,
		desc_operadora as string,
		id_operadora as string,
		desc_motivo as string,
		id_fatura_origem as string,
		vlr_pagamento as decimal(15,2),
		dt_emissao as timestamp,
		vlr_fatura as decimal(15,2),
		uf_nf as string,
		cpf_cnpj as string,
		tipo_documento as string,
		desc_contestacao as string,
		desc_detalhe as string,
		cc_db_ajuste as string,
		cc_cr_ajuste as string,
		tipo_instancia as string,
		subtype_code as decimal(19,0),
		tipo_detalhe as string,
		vlr_imposto_constestado as decimal(15,2),
		vlr_imposto_icms as decimal(15,2),
		vlr_bruto as decimal(15,2),
		vlr_outros_impostos as decimal(15,2),
		dt_vencto_original as date,
		dt_pagamento as date,
		id_detalhe as decimal(10,0),
		num_instancia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT d.account_no, i.id_fatura, i.id_open_item,i.nota_fiscal,i.vlr_item,i.serie_nf, i.subserie_nf,c.conta_cobranca,c.vlr_contestado as vlr_total_atribuido,d.vlr_contestado as vlr_atribuido, d.dt_contestacao as dt_ajuste,CONVERT(VARCHAR, d.dt_contestacao, 8) as hr_ajuste, d.desc_operadora, d.id_operadora,d.desc_motivo,c.id_fatura_origem, c.vlr_pagamento,c.dt_emissao,c.vlr_fatura,i.uf_nf, d.cpf_cnpj,case when len(d.cpf_cnpj) = 11 then 'CPF' when len(d.cpf_cnpj) = 14 then 'CNPJ'else null end as tipo_documento, d.desc_contestacao,d.desc_detalhe,d.cc_db_ajuste,d.cc_cr_ajuste,d.tipo_instancia, d.subtype_code,d.tipo_detalhe,d.vlr_imposto_constestado,d.vlr_imposto_icms, d.vlr_bruto, d.vlr_outros_impostos,c.dt_vencto_original,c.dt_pagamento, d.id_detalhe, d.num_instancia FROM [convenio].[CVVW_FATURA_CON_KENAN_UNIC] c , [convenio].[CVTB_FATURA_ITEM_KENAN] i WITH(NOLOCK), [convenio].[CVTB_FATURA_DET_KENAN] d WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE c.id_fatura_origem = i.id_fatura AND c.id_fatura_origem = d.id_fatura AND c.cpf_cnpj = i.cpf_cnpj AND c.cpf_cnpj = d.cpf_cnpj AND c.conta_cobranca = i.conta_cobranca AND c.conta_cobranca = d.conta_cobranca AND d.id_open_item = i.id_open_item  AND c.id_lote_arquivo in (SELECT id_lote_arquivo FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE ID_LOTE = {$pLote}) AND i.id_lote_arquivo in (SELECT id_lote_arquivo FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE ID_LOTE = {$pLote}) AND d.id_lote_arquivo in(SELECT id_lote_arquivo FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE id_lote = {$pLote})"),
	format: 'query') ~> TabelasKenan
TabelasKenan derive(id_lote_ajuste = $pLote,
		nome_billing = 'Kenan',
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG_NORMALIZADO = replace(trim(nota_fiscal), right(nota_fiscal, 3), ''),
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO_NORMALIZADO = concat(trim(serie_nf), '123'),
		cd_criado_por = 'Carga ADF - CargaArqKenan',
		dt_criado_em = add(currentTimestamp(), hours(-3)),
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ = $pMesAnoRef,
		FL_STATUS_GERAL = 'NT',
		SERIE_SUBSERIE_NF = concat(coalesce(serie_nf, ''), coalesce(subserie_nf, '') )) ~> AdaptaPontuacao
AdaptaPontuacao sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_CONTESTACAO as decimal(28,0),
		ID_CLIENTE as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_NF_ORIG as timestamp,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT as decimal(15,2),
		SERIE_NF as string,
		COD_IDENT_CLI as string,
		CPF_CNPJ as string,
		NOME_CLIENTE as string,
		TERMINAL as string,
		VLR_TOTAL_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(15,2),
		DT_ATRIBUICAO as timestamp,
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		DESCR_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		DESC_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO as string,
		CLASSE_RECEBER as string,
		CONTA_FINANCEIRA as string,
		DESC_CONTA_FINANCEIRA as string,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL as string,
		VLR_DOC_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		FATURA_ATRIBUIDA as string,
		VLR_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		UF_FATURA as string,
		SEQ_RECEBIVEL as string,
		DT_EMISSAO as timestamp,
		MODELO as string,
		NUMORDEMDOITEM as decimal(3,0),
		BC_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		ALIQUOTA_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		BC_ICMS_RECALCULADA as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_RECALCULADO as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_PARA_RESSARCIMENTO as decimal(15,2),
		SITUACAO as string,
		MES_APURACAO as string,
		TIPO_DOC as decimal(1,0),
		COD_CONSUMIDOR as string,
		CHAVE_AUTENTICACAO as string,
		TOTAL_MESTRE as decimal(15,2),
		BC_ICMS_MESTRE as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_DESTACADO as decimal(15,2),
		INSCRICAO_ESTADUAL as string,
		RAZAO_SOCIAL as string,
		FL_STATUS_GERAL as string,
		ID_LOTE_AJUSTE as decimal(28,0),
		ID_ENTREGA_RESSARCIMENTO as decimal(28,0),
		CD_ITEM as string,
		DS_ITEM as string,
		HR_AJUSTE as string,
		HR_ATRIBUICAO as string,
		NOME_BILLING as string,
		TIPO_CLIENTE as string,
		DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		DT_FECHA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_FATURA_INI as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_FATURA_FIM as decimal(15,2),
		COD_CLIENTE as string,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO as string,
		NOME_FANTASIA as string,
		COD_GRUPO as string,
		NOME_GRUPO_ECONOMICO as string,
		SEGMENTO_CLIENTE as string,
		SUB_SEGMENTO_CLIENTE as string,
		SEGMENTO_VALOR as string,
		CLASSE_ELEGIBILIDADE as string,
		DESCR_SERV_AJUSTE as string,
		DESCR_SERV as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		SALDO_POS_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		TIPO_OPERACAO as string,
		TIPO_TERMINAL as string,
		DONO_RECEITA as string,
		SUBTYPE_CODE as decimal(19,0),
		TIPO_DESCR_SERV as string,
		DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA as timestamp,
		VLR_IMPOSTO_CONTESTADO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_IMPOSTO_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_BRUTO_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_OUTROS_IMPOSTOS as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CREDITO_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CREDITO_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_DEVOLUCAO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_FATURA_FUTURA as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CONTESTADO_FUTURO as decimal(15,2),
		LOGIN_ATENDIMENTO as string,
		DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL as timestamp,
		DT_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO as timestamp,
		NUM_ITEM_ESTORNADO as decimal(10,0),
		FLG_RETIFICADO as string,
		TERMINAL_115 as string,
		VALOR_ITEM_115 as decimal(15,2),
		DT_CRIADO_EM as timestamp,
		CD_CRIADO_POR as string,
		DT_ATUALIZADO_EM as timestamp,
		CD_ATUALIZADO_POR as string,
		MES_ANO_FAT_ORIGINAL as string,
		MES_ANO_FAT_AJUSTE as string,
		VLR_PAGAMENTO_FAT_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		ID_ITEM_CONVENIO_115 as decimal(28,0),
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO_NORMALIZADO as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG_NORMALIZADO as string,
		COD_FAC_CD as decimal(10,0),
		CCM_SERVICO_CONTESTADO as string,
		COD_TIPO_RCBL_FATURA as string,
		DESCR_RCBL_FATURA as string,
		DT_PAGAMENTO as timestamp,
		DEBIT_ID as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIGINAL as timestamp,
		UF_NF as string,
		VLR_PGTO_ALOCADO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_TOTAL_PGTO as decimal(15,2),
		CREDIT_ID as string,
		DT_REFERENCIA as timestamp,
		DT_IMPORTACAO as timestamp,
		STEP_EXECUTION_ID as decimal(18,0),
		JOB_EXECUTION_ID as decimal(18,0),
		ID_MESTRE_CONVENIO_115 as decimal(28,0),
		FL_MANUAL_CONCILIACAO as string,
		DT_CONCILIACAO as timestamp,
		DT_EMISSAO_115 as timestamp,
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_CLIENTE = account_no,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG = nota_fiscal,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT = vlr_item,
		SERIE_NF = SERIE_SUBSERIE_NF,
		COD_IDENT_CLI = conta_cobranca,
		CPF_CNPJ = cpf_cnpj,
		VLR_TOTAL_ATRIBUIDO = vlr_total_atribuido,
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO = vlr_atribuido,
		DT_AJUSTE = dt_ajuste,
		HR_AJUSTE = hr_ajuste,
		DESCR_OPERADORA = desc_operadora,
		COD_OPERADORA = id_operadora,
		DESC_MOTIVO_AJUSTE = desc_motivo,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL = id_fatura_origem,
		VLR_PAGAMENTO_FAT_ORIGINAL = vlr_pagamento,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIGINAL = dt_emissao,
		VLR_FATURA = vlr_fatura,
		UF_FATURA = uf_nf,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO = tipo_documento,
		DESCR_SERV_AJUSTE = desc_contestacao,
		DESCR_SERV = desc_detalhe,
		CONTACONTABIL_DB = cc_db_ajuste,
		CONTACONTABIL_CR = cc_cr_ajuste,
		TIPO_TERMINAL = tipo_instancia,
		SUBTYPE_CODE = subtype_code,
		TIPO_DESCR_SERV = tipo_detalhe,
		VLR_IMPOSTO_CONTESTADO = vlr_imposto_constestado,
		VLR_IMPOSTO_ICMS = vlr_imposto_icms,
		VLR_BRUTO_ITEM = vlr_bruto,
		VLR_OUTROS_IMPOSTOS = vlr_outros_impostos,
		NOME_BILLING = nome_billing,
		DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL = dt_vencto_original,
		DT_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO = dt_pagamento,
		NUM_ITEM_ESTORNADO = id_detalhe,
		DT_CRIADO_EM = dt_criado_em,
		CD_CRIADO_POR = cd_criado_por,
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO_NORMALIZADO,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG_NORMALIZADO,
		ID_LOTE_AJUSTE = id_lote_ajuste,
		FL_STATUS_GERAL,
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ,
		TERMINAL = num_instancia,
		UF_NF = uf_nf
	)) ~> TabelaCONTESTACAO
